PROCLAMATION TO PROVIDE FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT QFTHE NATIONAL DISASTER PREVENTION AND PREPAREDNESS FUND AND ITS ADMINISTRATION
WHEREAS, it is found necessary to strengthen the existing capacities for quick disaster response;
NOW, THEREFORE, in accordance with Article 55( I) of the Constitution of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, it is hereby proclaimed as follows:
This proclamation may be cited as the ''National Disaster Prevention and Preparedness Fund Establishment Proclamation No. 212/2000''.

Definitions
* The word "Relief" and the phrase "Relief Program'' shall have the definitions proivded for in Article 2( 1) and 2(2) of the Disaster Prevention and Preparedness Commission Establishment Proclamation No. 10/1995.
<\li2>
		* "National Committee" means the National DisasÂ­ter Prevention and Preparedness Committee sp\!c;fied in Article 7(I) of Proclamation No. 10/1995.

Establishment of Fund
* The National Disaster Prevention and Preparedness Fund (hereinafter referred to as ''the Fund'') is hereby established by this proclamation.
